products.name: Robot Dog
products.description: An adorable man's best friend robot, with all the love and affection and none of the poop!

products.name: Robot Boyfriend
products.description: A realistic boyfriend robot, with love and affection and no farts!

products.name: Robot Girlfriend
products.description: A realistic girlfriend robot, with love and affection and no need for long showers!

products.name: Robot Grandma
products.description: A realistic Grandma robot, with a Grandma's love and affection and no false teeth to clean!

products.name: Robot Child Sibling
products.description: Want to give your child a sibling, but dont want to cause irreperable environmental impact by having another child? Then robot child sibling is for you, all the love and affection of a sibling for your little one and no boo-boos to have to worry about!

products.name: Chef Robot
products.description: Want restaurant quality meals in the comfort of your own home? Chef Robot is for you!

products.name: Cleaner Robot
products.description: Who needs a roomba, when you can have a full house clean everyday from Cleaner Robot, with built in Lemon Pledge!

products.name: Chauffer Robot
products.description: Dont give your money to Elon, Chauffer Robot can take you where you want to go!

products.name: Gardener Robot
products.description: If your green fingers are a little lacking, Gardener Robot can revolutionise your green areas. He eats all the cuttings and transforms it into a great compost!

products.name: Security Robot
products.description: Security Robot protects your home and lets you sleep better at night. Not for people named Sarah Connor.
